description: This file defines a retry mechanism for a tool call within an agent framework, including a post-hook function to check shopping list length and a tool function to add items to the shopping list, along with agent initialization and usage.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with a model, session state, tools, and response capabilities.

methods.name: post_hook
methods.description: A post-processing hook that checks the shopping list length and raises a retry exception if less than 3 items.

methods.name: add_item
methods.description: A tool function to add an item to the shopping list within the agent's session state.
